name: Bo Jackson in The Temple of Ming
name_original: Bo Jackson in The Temple of Ming
description:
Go on an adventure, take control of debonaire gentleman Bo Jackson as he ventures into the dreaded Temple of Ming!
Collect fragile vases and balance them as best you can while mysterious forces do their best to ruin your day!!

In spirit of the theme, the more vases you currently have, the harder it is to balance all of them. Also more enemies spawn! Lots of enemies!

Made by:
